text: Kꞌa te riꞌ xeꞌkitaq bꞌik e jujun fariseos e kachiꞌl e jujun herodianos12:13 Ri winaq ri kitoꞌom ri Herodes rachiꞌl ri e ralkꞌwaꞌl are kakaj ketaqan pa kiwiꞌ ri winaq aꞌj Israel, are kꞌu ri kiwinaq ri e fariseos man kakaj taj. rukꞌ ri Jesús rech kakikoj jun kꞌaꞌmabꞌal che rukꞌ ri tzij ri tajin kubꞌij.
